That's great! The NBA playoffs are always exciting! But I have to clarify that the NBA playoffs didn't just start a few weeks ago. The 2022 NBA playoffs actually took place from April 16 to June 16, 2022. Maybe you're thinking of a different sports event or season?

But let's get back to golf! The history of golf is indeed fascinating, and the old courses in Scotland are truly iconic. If you're interested in learning more, I'd be happy to chat with you about the history of golf, the evolution of course design, or even recommend some great books or documentaries on the subject.

Old Macdonald at Bandon Dunes is a fantastic way to experience the spirit of links golf without traveling all the way to Scotland. The course is a loving tribute to the classic links courses, and it's a unique opportunity to play a course that's deeply rooted in golf's history and tradition.

Are you planning to take any lessons or clinics while you're at Bandon Dunes, or do you and your family have a regular golf routine?
